The '''Sonic Add-On''' is an add-on developed by ''[[Gamemode One]]'', which adds blocks, items and morphs of characters from the ''[[Minecraft x Sonic the Hedgehog|Sonic the Hedgehog]]'' franchise.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
* [[File:Sonic Intro Book.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Sonic Add-On Book
** Contains explanations and recipes for the blocks and mechanics included in the add-on
** Appears in the inventory upon starting the map.
* [[File:Amy Token.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Amy Life 
** Turns player into {{Wikipedia|Amy Rose}}. 
* [[File:Knuckles Token.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Knuckles Life 
** Turns player into {{Wikipedia|Knuckles the Echidna|Knuckles}}.
* [[File:Shadow Token.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Shadow Life 
** Turns player into {{Wikipedia|Shadow the Hedgehog}}.
* [[File:Sonic Token.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Sonic Life
** Turns player into {{Wikipedia|Sonic the Hedgehog}}.
* [[File:Tails Token.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Tails Life
** Turns player into {{Wikipedia|Miles "Tails" Prower|Tails}}. 
* [[File:Sonic Ring.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Ring
** Used as currency in Tails Tinker's Table.
